Jason Derr

Full-Stack Developer

Me in 30 Seconds

Honestly, I only need 10 seconds because my son is the most important thing in my life and that will forever be the case. Every Sunday is "Saxo & Dado day", which means I'm probably sunburnt, hopped up on sugar, and getting shot at with a nerf gun. I am a single father who is fascinated with the usable psychology of self-improvement, Stoicism, and Philosophy. A California native who loves surfing, hiking, and running with my dog. If you would like to know more about my story as a developer, check me out Here.

Below is a link to my Front-End projects. They include a local weather page, a workable drum Kit, whack-a-mole game, tic tac toe game.

Back-End Code

Here are three Back-End projects. First, I wrote a database backed application that determines the winner of a swiss-system tournament. Also an internal reporting tool for a newspaper site to discover what articles and authors are the most popular. And on what days had the most 404 errors.

Fun-Code

Fun Code? All code is fun code!! Here are a few games I made, A speech recorder in over 30 different languages. Fancy clock. And much more. Check it out.
